title: Marketing & Video Assistant Who Loves Motorcycles
job_overview:
We are seeking a skilled video editor with a passion for motorcycle building to help us create compelling video content. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing dynamic and engaging videos that showcase the intricacies of motorcycle construction, capture the excitement of our races and showcase the value of our products. 

If you have a strong understanding of the motorcycle culture and can bring creativity to the editing process, we would love to hear from you! Please provide samples of your previous work in related fields.

This job would also include managing our content calendar, posting across all social media channels, helping with website listings, product photography and possibly t Shirt and merch design. We're looking for someone who can own the entire process of taking our footage and photography from a raw state to editing and posting it as well as helping with other tasks.
